tool_description:
Introducing the Google Bard Chat API, your gateway to seamless interaction with Bard, a formidable language model driven by the PaLM Model. This API empowers you to harness Bard's chat capabilities programmatically.

Key Features of the Google Bard Chat API:

1. Cutting-Edge Language Generation: Tap into the advanced PaLM Model integrated into the API for top-tier language generation.

2. Real-time Knowledge: Access a model trained with the latest information up to 2023, ensuring accuracy and...
name: Google Bard Chat API
title: Google Bard Chat API

api_list.name: ask

required_parameters.name: question
required_parameters.default: best place to ear near me

required_parameters.name: bard___Secure-1PSID_cookie_value
required_parameters.description: A string representing your bard __Secure-1PSID cookie (You can get your __Secure-1PSID cookie by simply accessing Developer Consolle and search for __Secure-1PSID  cookie Name https://i.ibb.co/5WHmCQ8/Screenshot-2023-05-30-231728-1.png )
